actions.subject: Welcome to our newsletter!
actions.message: Thank you for subscribing to our newsletter! You'll now receive updates on our latest news and offers.

consultation.name: Consultation Request

actions.subject: We received your consultation request
actions.message: Thank you for your interest in our Corporate Sales Excellence Program! We've received your consultation request and will contact you within 24 hours to discuss your organization's specific needs and goals.

consultation.successMessage: Your consultation request has been sent. We'll contact you within 24 hours!

actions.subject: We received your message
actions.message: Thank you for contacting us! We've received your message and will respond within 24 hours. We're looking forward to helping transform your business.

contact.successMessage: Your message has been sent. Thank you! We'll respond within 24 hours.
